738fadfde8c5.name: pump_bearing_failure
738fadfde8c5.detection_method: Vibration increase 2-4 weeks before failure; bearing temperature rise 1-2 weeks
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per pump maintenance plan

d16f55462217.name: pump_seal_failure
d16f55462217.detection_method: Pressure fluctuation; may detect leak via gas/liquid detectors
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per pump maintenance plan

f4e226a59858.name: pump_cavitation
f4e226a59858.description: Erosion damage, vibration, noise, reduced performance
f4e226a59858.detection_method: High-frequency vibration signature; suction pressure drops below NPSHr
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per pump maintenance plan

7c60f6d8d8dc.name: pump_shaft_misalignment
7c60f6d8d8dc.description: Increased vibration at 1x and 2x RPM, coupling wear
7c60f6d8d8dc.detection_method: Axial vibration increase at 2x RPM; temperature rise on coupling side bearing
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per pump maintenance plan

d9a7ec00ecf3.name: compressor_surge
d9a7ec00ecf3.description: Rapid flow reversal, severe vibration, potential mechanical damage
d9a7ec00ecf3.detection_method: Sudden flow drop with pressure oscillation; anti-surge valve should open
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per compressor maintenance plan

2d0862b15d9e.name: compressor_bearing_failure
2d0862b15d9e.description: Vibration increase, temperature rise, potential catastrophic failure
2d0862b15d9e.detection_method: Radial vibration trend increase over weeks; bearing metal temperature rise
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per compressor maintenance plan

2dcb72ca9dc1.name: compressor_fouling
2dcb72ca9dc1.description: Reduced efficiency, higher discharge temperature, reduced capacity
2dcb72ca9dc1.detection_method: Gradual polytropic efficiency drop; discharge temperature creep over months
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per compressor maintenance plan

bfb5ed9b3e3b.name: heat_exchanger_fouling
bfb5ed9b3e3b.description: Reduced heat transfer, increased pressure drop, higher outlet temperatures
bfb5ed9b3e3b.detection_method: Outlet temperature drift; differential pressure increase over weeks/months
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per heat_exchanger maintenance plan

e20991d8c9aa.name: heat_exchanger_tube_failure
e20991d8c9aa.description: Cross-contamination between shell and tube fluids
e20991d8c9aa.detection_method: Product quality change; pressure differential change; may see in downstream analysis
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per heat_exchanger maintenance plan

94514e7820e8.name: heat_exchanger_external_leakage
94514e7820e8.description: Loss of containment, fire/explosion risk if hydrocarbon
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per heat_exchanger maintenance plan

45547bf92131.name: separator_high_output
45547bf92131.description: Liquid carryover to gas outlet, floods downstream equipment
45547bf92131.detection_method: Level rising; gas outlet quality deteriorating
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per separator maintenance plan

1be5b85d37c7.name: separator_corrosion
1be5b85d37c7.description: Wall thinning, potential loss of containment
1be5b85d37c7.detection_method: Thickness monitoring via UT inspection; corrosion coupon trends
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per separator maintenance plan

5e98e24f968a.name: column_fouling
5e98e24f968a.description: Increased pressure drop, reduced separation efficiency, flooding
5e98e24f968a.detection_method: Differential pressure increase; product quality degradation
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per column maintenance plan

67dec68f51b1.name: column_plugged
67dec68f51b1.description: Tray/packing blockage, loss of mass transfer
67dec68f51b1.detection_method: Sudden pressure drop increase; level disturbance
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per column maintenance plan

36b56008eb6f.name: valve_stuck
36b56008eb6f.description: Valve fails to move to required position
36b56008eb6f.detection_method: Stem travel feedback differs from signal; flow control loop oscillation
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per valve maintenance plan

ad0914f0ae99.name: valve_internal_leakage
ad0914f0ae99.description: Passing when closed, cannot achieve tight shutoff
ad0914f0ae99.detection_method: Downstream pressure/flow when valve commanded closed
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per valve maintenance plan

190bd2f81dca.name: motor_insulation_failure
190bd2f81dca.description: Winding short circuit, ground fault, motor failure
190bd2f81dca.detection_method: Current imbalance between phases; winding temperature rise
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per motor maintenance plan

4533016d8236.name: motor_overheating
4533016d8236.description: Reduced insulation life, potential winding failure
4533016d8236.detection_method: Winding temperature trending up; ambient temperature contribution
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per motor maintenance plan

22d94d8fb7d1.name: tank_corrosion
22d94d8fb7d1.description: Floor/shell thinning, potential leak to containment
22d94d8fb7d1.detection_method: API 653 inspection findings; UT thickness readings; leak detection
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per tank maintenance plan

781a7a669b1c.name: tank_high_output
preventive_actions: Regular inspection per tank maintenance plan

535f9a455a44.name: Centrifugal Pump PM — Quarterly
steps: 1. Isolate pump (LOTO procedure, blind flanges if required)
2. Record baseline vibration readings (overall + spectrum)
3. Check mechanical seal for leakage (visual + drip rate)
4. Record bearing temperatures (DE and NDE)
5. Check coupling alignment (laser alignment tool)
6. Inspect coupling element for wear/cracking
7. Check foundation bolts for tightness
8. Verify lube oil level and quality (sample for lab analysis)
9. Check suction strainer differential pressure
10. Verify instrument readings (pressure gauges, temperature)
11. Run performance test: record head, flow, power at 3 operating points
12. Update maintenance records in CMMS
safety_precautions: Verify zero energy state (pressure, electrical, stored energy)
Wear appropriate PPE (face shield if seal area work)
Fire watch if in hazardous area

204790bfe009.name: Compressor Predictive Monitoring — Monthly
steps: 1. Collect vibration data: DE bearing X-Y, NDE bearing X-Y, axial
2. Collect vibration spectrum (0-1000 Hz, 8192 lines resolution)
3. Collect shaft orbit plots from proximity probes
4. Record bearing metal temperatures
5. Perform infrared thermography scan (bearings, coupling, casing)
6. Ultrasonic scan for internal defects / valve leakage
7. Record operating parameters (P, T, flow, speed, power)
8. Calculate polytropic efficiency and compare to baseline
9. Check anti-surge valve stroke and response time
10. Analyze trends and update predictive maintenance forecast
safety_precautions: Maintain safe distance from rotating parts

41d726d00609.name: Heat Exchanger Inspection — Annual
steps: 1. Isolate, drain, and gas-free exchanger (confined space entry procedures)
2. Remove channel head covers / floating head
3. Visual inspection of tubes, tubesheet, baffles
4. UT thickness measurements on shell and nozzles (grid pattern)
5. Eddy current testing on tube bundle (100% if critical, 20% sample otherwise)
6. Measure tube-to-tubesheet joint integrity
7. Hydrostatic test if tube plugging or repairs performed
8. Clean tube bundle (hydro-blasting or chemical cleaning)
9. Reassemble with new gaskets, torque to specification
10. Pressure test and reinstate
safety_precautions: Gas test before entry (O2, LEL, H2S, CO)

ff98a43b4ff2.name: Safety Valve Testing — Annual Proof Test
steps: 1. Plan test window with operations (may require online or offline test)
2. If offline: isolate PSV, remove for bench testing
3. Test pop pressure on test bench (must be within ±3% of set pressure)
4. Test reseat pressure (must close cleanly, no chatter)
5. Check for seat leakage (bubble test)
6. Recondition if required (lap seats, replace springs)
7. Reset and certify
8. Reinstall with new gaskets
9. Update SIF proof test records

6def8e59b6b8.name: V-101 High Level Trip
6def8e59b6b8.logic_description: IF LT-101A OR LT-101B > 90% THEN close XV-101 inlet valve
6def8e59b6b8.hazard_description: Liquid carryover to compressor causing mechanical damage
6def8e59b6b8.consequence_of_failure: Compressor damage, potential gas release, $2M+ repair cost

06767d47a4ad.name: C-201 High Vibration Trip
06767d47a4ad.logic_description: IF VT-201DE AND VT-201NDE > 18 mm/s THEN trip compressor, close suction/discharge valves
06767d47a4ad.hazard_description: Catastrophic bearing/shaft failure during high vibration
06767d47a4ad.consequence_of_failure: Compressor destruction, potential casing breach, fire risk

56992aaee4a1.name: C-201 Anti-Surge
56992aaee4a1.logic_description: Anti-surge controller opens recycle valve when operating point approaches surge line

fb89eeafa436.name: C-201 High Discharge Temperature
fb89eeafa436.hazard_description: Overheating damages seals, bearings, and may ignite lube oil

f3e2021d6353.name: T-301 High Pressure
f3e2021d6353.logic_description: IF PT-301 > 85 barg THEN close inlet, open relief to flare
f3e2021d6353.hazard_description: Column overpressure leading to loss of containment

dfa1710010d0.name: pump_head_vs_flow
dfa1710010d0.description: Centrifugal pump head decreases with flow (pump curve). As flow increases, discharge pressure drops.

9f5860444061.name: pump_power_vs_flow
9f5860444061.description: Pump power consumption proportional to flow × head. Motor current tracks power demand.
9f5860444061.equation: P = rho * g * Q * H / (eta_pump * eta_motor)

a51eb486ab43.name: pump_temperature_vs_power
a51eb486ab43.description: Bearing temperature rises with power load and reduces with cooling. Thermal lag of ~15 minutes.

ae697dc4d52b.name: compressor_discharge_temp
ae697dc4d52b.description: Polytropic compression: discharge temperature determined by pressure ratio, suction temperature, and efficiency.

2ee34b5fa154.name: compressor_surge_proximity
2ee34b5fa154.description: Compressor approaches surge when flow drops below surge line. Anti-surge valve opens to protect.

d9c1e12ecf5c.name: compressor_power_vs_flow_speed
d9c1e12ecf5c.description: Compressor power follows fan laws: proportional to speed cubed. Gas density affects loading.

904af19fd75c.name: hx_lmtd_fouling
904af19fd75c.description: Heat exchanger duty drops with fouling. Outlet temp rises on hot side, drops on cold side.
904af19fd75c.equation: Q = U * A * LMTD; U decreases as fouling increases

13bc4b43ee21.name: hx_dp_vs_fouling
13bc4b43ee21.description: Pressure drop across exchanger increases as fouling builds up. Exponential relationship.

37dddba1c573.name: separator_level_balance
37dddba1c573.description: Separator level is mass balance: inflow minus outflows. Level rises if outlets restricted.

8217281f7ad0.name: column_dp_vs_loading
8217281f7ad0.description: Column differential pressure increases with vapor and liquid loading. Flooding if DP exceeds limit.

5f4184630fd2.name: pipe_pressure_drop
5f4184630fd2.description: Darcy-Weisbach: pressure drop along pipe proportional to velocity squared, length, and friction.

c92574aeff73.name: vibration_vs_imbalance
c92574aeff73.description: Vibration at 1x RPM frequency increases with rotor imbalance. Phase angle indicates heavy spot location.

23252ec7065d.name: motor_current_vs_load
23252ec7065d.description: Motor current proportional to shaft load. Current spike during startup (6-8x rated).

3713e67b7fdd.name: Pump failure → Loss of cooling → Exchanger overtemperature
3713e67b7fdd.description: CW pump trip causes loss of cooling water flow. Exchanger hot-side outlet temperature rises within 15 minutes.

70c6aa112b57.name: Exchanger fouling → High suction temperature → Compressor surge
70c6aa112b57.description: Aftercooler fouling increases suction temperature, reducing gas density and compressor capacity. May push operating point toward surge.

2283e1c41b40.name: Separator liquid carryover → Compressor liquid damage
2283e1c41b40.description: Liquid carryover from separator enters compressor suction. Immediate severe vibration and potential mechanical damage.

60dd1123a777.name: Amine pump failure → Loss of sweetening → Off-spec gas
60dd1123a777.description: Amine pump trip stops lean amine flow to contactor. H2S in sweet gas rises within minutes, off-spec gas to pipeline.

93e5f8f22236.name: Instrument air compressor failure → Control valve failure
93e5f8f22236.description: Loss of instrument air causes control valves to fail to their safe position (open/close). Plant-wide control disruption.

b75b3fc18977.name: Cooling water pump trip → Multiple exchanger impact
b75b3fc18977.description: Single cooling water pump serves multiple exchangers. Trip cascades to all downstream process temperatures.
